item.title: Report E-2025020209
item.description:
Report E-2025020209

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-17T21:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-15
  • City: MARSHFIELD
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 2238 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal XSJ. It was reported that approximately 3 ounces of Preventol IT 14 Preservative was released from a 5-gallon plastic jug due to a packaging issue, bad seal on the cap. The release impacted the inside of the box the jug shipped in. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller, and they felt comfortable cleaning up the release with PPE available on-site. Even though policy states that a contractor needed to be sent for all corrosive releases, the spill was contained to the inside of the box, and the caller felt comfortable placing the box into a DF for disposal. Called Chemtrec and spoke to Chris. Report # 2025011500237.
